```{r}
require(dplyr)
require(tidyr)
require(ggplot2)

df <- data.frame(date=c("31/08/2011", "31/07/2011", "30/06/2011"),                     values=c(0.8378,0.8457,0.8147))
#no Date format ->OK

dateConvert<-as.Date(df$date,'%d/%m/%Y')

df<-mutate(df,dateC=dateConvert)
#with Date format -> NOK

df

```

```{r}

df_Boeing = read.csv('BoeingStock.csv')
df_Coca = read.csv('CocaColaStock.csv')
df_Procter = read.csv('ProcterGambleStock.csv')
df_GE = read.csv('GEStock.csv')
df_IBM = read.csv('IBMStock.csv')
dfos <- list(Boeing=df_Boeing,Coca=df_Coca,Procter = df_Procter,GE = df_GE,IBM =df_IBM)


for (namo in names(dfos)){
  dfos[[namo]]<- tbl_df(dfos[[namo]])
  
  DateConvert <-as.Date(strptime(dfos[[namo]]$Date,"%d/%m/%y"))
  dfos[[namo]]$Date = as.Date(strptime(dfos[[namo]]$Date,"%d/%m/%y"))
  print(head(dfos[[namo]]))
}

```
